oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Martha White Flour Co. Job No. 38147
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Accounting; Hatch Show Print (Firm); Flatt, Lester; Scruggs, Earl;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Invoice (No. 2680) for an order placed by the Martha White Flour Company for 150 two color window cards for a performance by Lester Flatt and Earl Scruggs at the Nottowa Theatre in Blackstone, Virginia on April 20, 50 two color window cards for a performance by Lester Flatt and Earl Scruggs at Buckingham Central High School in Buckingham, Virginia on April 21, and 200 two color window cards for a performance by Lester Flatt and Earl Scruggs at the Halifax County High School in South Boston, Virginia on April 22. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.
